description: Redevelopment of the existing two-storey grouping of buildings at 67-75 The Broadway, West Ealing for a 75 bedroom hotel development (Use Class C1) and A1 (Retail) and A2 (Professional Services) at ground-floor level. The proposal consists of the demolition of the existing two-storey building at 73-75 The Broadway and the construction of 5-storey development to create a 75-bedroom Hotel (C1 use class)  including the use of part of the ground-floor as an A2 use (Betting Shop) fronting onto Uxbridge Road and the relocation of the existing A1 - Butchers Shop to the rear part of the site, with a main retail frontage on to Melbourne Avenue. The proposal also involves the demolition of the existing first-floor at 67-73 The Broadway and the construction of a new two-storey structure above to be used as hotel accommodation; the continued use of the ground-floor units as A1 retail shops, associated servicing and deliveries.
